info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 27 at 2:34PM MST until September 27 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Miami, Claypool, and Globe areas in Gila County.
* WHEN...Until 530 PM MST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding impacts to an already hard-hit area and in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 234 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 0.25 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Globe, Miami, Claypool, Central Heights-Midland City, Top Of The World, Top-Of-The-World and Inspiration. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
